title: Cashew, cranberry and spice biscotti
description: These Christmas biscuits are great for dunking into a hot cup of coffee, hot chocolate or even mulled wine for a change to mince pies.
ingredients: 100g/3½oz self-raising flour, plus extra for dusting
75g/2¾oz raw, unsalted cashew nuts, roughly chopped
1 vanilla pod, seeds scraped out or 1 tsp vanilla extract
